projects: [{"title":"Information Geometric Approaches to Parameter Estimation in Latent Variable Models","start_date":"Aug 2023","end_date":"Apr 2024","description":"Concepts from Differential Geometry made use of to study statistical manifolds and solve classical problems in the Information Geometric realm to arrive at interesting results."},{"title":"Traffic Network Flow Prediction","start_date":"Aug 2022","end_date":"Apr 2023","description":"Designed various ML models to deal with the spatio-temporal correlations as well as short term/long term prediction."},{"title":"Design of 8 bit Digital to Analog Converter DAC","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"Various current mirrors used to design an 8 bit DAC and also implemented the current steering version to improve the performance."}]
